name: Carrot Soup
recipeIngredient: 2 1/2 pounds carrots, peeled and sliced (about 6 cups)

recipeInstructions.text: In a heavy-bottomed pot, melt the butter. When it starts to foam, add the onions and thyme and cook over medium-low heat until tender, about 10 minutes. Add the carrots, season with salt and cook for 5 minutes. Pour in the broth, bring to a boil and then simmer until the carrots are tender, about 30 minutes. Season to taste with salt. For a smooth soup, use a blender and puree until smooth.
